title: Did "the Republic of West Virginia " tell women to" prepare their coats "?
subtitle: A member of the Barkersburg City Council, Eric Barber, commented on a "coat hanger" in response to an article on Facebook about the confirmation by the Supreme Court of Brett Cavanaugh.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Republican Eric Barber "celebrate" confirmed by the Supreme Court of Brett Cavanaugh by telling women "to make your coats ready."
